text: You find yourself walking home, after spending an entire day working.
Frustrated, you continue to move on, only to be stopped by the loud sounds of explosions.
You watch the blood of the innocent drop in front of you... a truly horrific sight, as a being armed with a blade emerges from the smoke.

name: Aubrey
text: What the...

name: Void
text: And you... you... aaand you.

name: Aubrey
text: Oh shit.
You decide to back off.

name: Eva
text: Void, I gave you the order to bring down a few, not to murder half the cities' population. Remember the deal.

name: Void
text: IT'S TAKING TOO LONG! I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR AGES!

name: Aubrey
text: What is going on...

name: Eva
text: H-Hey! H-help!

name: Aubrey
text: W-What? N-no!
She hides behind you.

name: Eva
text: P-please, he's trying to kill me.

name: Aubrey
text: Don't drag me into this!

name: Eva
text: L-Let's teleport away!

name: Void
text: NO YOU DON'T!
In the blink of an eye, the two of you are gone.

name: Eva
text: I'm sorry! I had to!

name: Eva
text: He'll find us soon... Can you help me out?!

name: Aubrey
text: I just wanna go home...

name: Eva
text: I can't do this alone, pleaaaaase?

name: Aubrey
text: Why was he even after you in the first place? Better question, who are you?

name: Eva
text: I'm Eva, queen of the mirror world. That imbecilic child after me is a mercinary, targeted to kill me.

name: Aubrey
text: I see... so... why do you need me?

name: Eva
text: He already got rid of my strongest warriors.

name: Aubrey
text: A h . . .

name: Aubrey
text: So you're putting all your hopes and dreams on a random girl you found walking on the street with no fighting experience.

name: Eva
text: I can teach you to become stronger I suppose?

name: Eva
text: Take this blade.... and let's spar on this slime over here.

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Aubrey
text: So tired...

name: Eva
text: You're a natural!

name: Aubrey
text: I just wanna rest!

name: Eva
text: No time for that.
After sparring on some slimes, footsteps approach rapidly.

name: Void
text: Found you.

name: Eva
text: Time for your first test!

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Eva
text: See? Wasn't so hard right?

name: Aubrey
text: Once I'm done with him, I will fucking kill you.

name: Eva
text: Suuuuuuuurely you won't, right?

name: Eva
text: I mean, we have a long journey to go! You can't just end me!

name: Aubrey
text: There's nothing in it for me! Besides, what even is he!

name: Eva
text: He's just like you! Just with two fancy weapons.

name: Aubrey
text: How are you thinking that this is a fair matchup?!

name: Void
text: Are you siding with a liar?
You turn around.

name: Aubrey
text: What..?

name: Eva
text: Ignore him. He's trying to make you side with him against me.

name: Void
text: You promised me something Eva. It's been long enough.
You cannot understand what Eva is saying. It's like she's speaking in a completely different language.

name: Void
text: Kill...

name: Aubrey
text: Hey! W-What's going on???
You feel afraid. You feel uneasy at Eva's precense.

name: Void
text: KILL...
You grip your sword tightly. You feel the weight of Eva sitting on your shoulder.

name: Eva
text: Stay calm. It should be over in a flash.

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Aubrey
text: Acck...

name: Aubrey
text: That was close...
Eva nods.

name: Eva
text: We can't allow that to happen again.

name: Aubrey
text: I agree.

name: Aubrey
text: He will only return stronger, what do we do?

name: Eva
text: Honestly... I don't know.

name: Aubrey
text: Why did he suddenly become so agressive?

name: Eva
text: His second blade is known as the Dark Spire. It's an ancient blade cursed with the soul of an old beast.

name: Eva
text: Legends say that the beast still has not passed to the afterlife after thousands of years. It's angry that the human race takes it.

name: Eva
text: Thus, it corrupts the user that wields it.

name: Aubrey
text: Interesting...

name: Aubrey
text: Can those effects be reversed..?

name: Eva
text: Sadly, I do not posess the power to weaken an angry spirit.

name: Eva
text: We have to resort to brute forcing it.

name: Eva
text: Then, we take Void's soul.

name: Aubrey
text: I see...
You take a deep breath. Is this the final fight? Can you really trust Eva's words? They feel right.
You think back to Void's words.

name: Void
text: You promised me something Eva. It's been long enough.
It bugs you. What did he mean by that?
Are you really... siding with the correct person..?

name: Eva
text: Aubrey? You alright?

name: Aubrey
text: Yeah, I'm fine. It's nothing.
Eva looks at you suspisciously.

name: Eva
text: Hm.. okay. I believe your words.

name: Eva
text: Ready to explore more?
You nod, proceeding to continue the adventure with Eva.
You feel like you're being stalked. It emits a dangering aura.
You hold your blade tightly.
In the corner of your eye, you see something lunge at Eva.
You quickly draw your blade and slash it.
The loud sound of something shattering overwhelms the quiet place.
The shattered pieces scatter everywhere, one cutting your cheek.

name: Eva
text: A-Aubrey?!

name: Aubrey
text: A sudden attack...

name: Eva
text: W-What?

name: Eva
text: I don't know what you're speaking of, foul beast!
You get in front of Eva

name: Aubrey
text: I got this.
The creature in front of you steps out of the shadows, revealing it's true glory. Huge, magnificent crystals for claws, blades merged with it.
It stares at you with great anger, before shifting eye color and trembling.
It lunges at you again, forcing you to dodge.

name: Eva
text: Aubrey, I trust you. End this.

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT
Eva grins and giggles.
Despite all the broken crystals, Void tries his best to get up.
The red shade in his eyes, slowly fading.
A tear shedding.
A heart as pure as a crystal right in front of him.

name: Eva
text: Let's finish this up.

name: Void
text: S-Starry.. I'm sorry I failed you...
You feel a sense of guilt and wrongdoing.

name: Aubrey
text: What am I fighting for again?

name: Eva
text: For my protection, miss Aubrey.

name: Void
text: Don't... listen to her.

name: Void
text: She's using you for power... she promised me to return my s-sist-

name: Eva
text: Silence maggot.
Your sense of guilt increases.

name: Eva
text: Let's finish him, shall we?

name: Void
text: D-Do what's right...
